page.title: 06TIMSBURY GROUPS
page.content: We asked the people of Timsbury about any groups or associations they belonged to.Our survey took place mid morning on a Monday.Most people that we interviewed did belong to one.The people we interviewed were mostly ladies and only a few men. Most seemed more interested in plants and animals than in humans.Not many people had to wear a uniform.Most people's clubs were for fun,but educational activities were not far behind in popularity.People went to their clubs weekly or monthly. Twice weekly was more rare.Everyone had to pay about Â£2 to Â£4 subscription per year for their groups.This was usually paid in weekly amounts. { By Joanne and Rebecca.
